question: Amit Panghal, who was seen in news recently, is a famous personality associated with which sports?
explanation:
Indian ace boxer Amit Panghal was seen in news, as he has been ranked first by the International Olympic Committee\'s (IOC) Boxing Task Force ahead of next month\'s Olympic Qualifiers.
With this, Amit became the first Indian boxer to be ranked first, in more than a decade. Before Amit, Vijender Singh was ranked first in 2009. The IOC Task force will conduct the Olympic qualifiers and the main event in Tokyo, as the International Boxing association is currently suspended.
